generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.stay Near Noteblock Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: The entity will attempt to toss the items from its inventory to a nearby recently played noteblock.

fields.title: Listen Time
fields.description: Sets the time an entity should stay near a noteblock after hearing it. Default value: 30.

fields.title: Speed
fields.description: Sets the entity's speed when moving toward the block. Default value: 1.

fields.title: Start Distance
fields.description: Sets the distance the entity needs to be away from the block to attempt to start the goal. Default value: 10.

fields.title: Stop Distance
fields.description: Sets the distance from the block the entity will attempt to reach. Default value: 2.
